heroSection.text: Start Your Own Laser Tag Business with Us!

aboutUsSection.title: About Us
aboutUsSection.subtitle: NETRONIC: The game is just beginning
aboutUsSection.description: LASERTAG.NET, part of the NETRONIC group, boasts 18 years of market leadership, evolving from a paintball club to a renowned laser tag equipment manufacturer. Our products undergo rigorous testing in our own venues, ensuring top-notch quality. Beyond manufacturing, we provide comprehensive business support, from consulting on promoting a laser tag arena to launching your own business. We are more than manufacturers, we are your business partners.

bottomText.textSpan: reputation in laser tag equipment manufacturing in this video:

checkOutTopList.title: Falcon F1
checkOutTopList.description: A lightweight version with a shortened buttstock designed for a younger audience.

checkOutTopList.title: Falcon F2
checkOutTopList.description: A full-length body with an extended buttstock — the best solution for adult laser tag enthusiasts.

checkOutTopList.title: Falcon Lux
checkOutTopList.description: A tagger with an upgraded impulse recoil module that accompanies  each shot with kickback aimed at the player's shoulder. The impulses are much more realistic than the vibration, allowing for a realistic feel of both single and turn-based shots.

checkOutTopList.title: Galaxy Eclipse
checkOutTopList.description: Galaxy Eclipse is an innovative and cutting-edge indoor laser tag game kit that brings a whole new level of excitement to the world of laser tag. Designed with advanced technology and features, this game kit takes the traditional laser tag experience to a whole new dimension.

checkOutBottomList.title: Netronic Headband
checkOutBottomList.description: The lightest headband in the laser tag industry, designed to withstand daily use and enabling you to become a zombie or medic without the need for a tagger.

checkOutBottomList.title: Netronic Vest
checkOutBottomList.description: The vest with hit sensors has a large hit detection area, which completely eliminates blind spots when shooting at close range.

checkOutBottomList.title: Scorpion shock-band
checkOutBottomList.description: A unique device that accompanies each game wound with an electrical impulse, allowing you to feel the hit as vividly as in paintball.

checkOutBottomList.title: Sirius
checkOutBottomList.description: A portable scenario device that can be used in any environment. Activation by touch or gunshot increases player interest and immerses them in the game.

checkOutBottomList.title: Multistation
checkOutBottomList.description: A device that gives visitors bonuses, and can also act as a domination box, bomb, or team base. The LED panel displays the selected mode in an animated manner, and loudspeakers will notify visitors about game events.

checkOutBottomList.title: Smart Domination box
checkOutBottomList.description: The Domination box capture is one of the most popular scenario devices in laser tag. This scenario device is placed in the center of the site or in other places of greatest activity.

checkOutBottomList.title: Supernova Laser Tag Bomb
checkOutBottomList.description: A device that gives visitors bonuses, and can also act as a domination box, bomb, or team base. The LED panel displays the selected mode in an animated manner, and loudspeakers will notify visitors about game events.

checkOutBottomList.title: Nebula - Laser Tag Granade
checkOutBottomList.description: The Domination box capture is one of the most popular scenario devices in laser tag. This scenario device is placed in the center of the site or in other places of greatest activity.

list.title: Child-friendly Equipment
list.description: Our laser tag equipment is designed for children as well, offering lightweight and comfortable gear.

list.title: In-house Testing Facility
list.description: Our dedicated laser tag center allows us to thoroughly test our equipment and software, ensuring that the products delivered to our clients are ready for immediate use.

list.title: Business Startup Cost
list.description: Initiate your venture with as little as $10,000

list.title: Patented Innovation
list.description: Our FALCON taggers include impulse recoil technologies, which are not found in any of our competitors. This is a patented development of LASERTAG.NET.

list.title: Cutting-edge Technology
list.description: Lasertag.net laser tag systems feature advanced sensors ensuring high precision and game reliability

list.title: Real-time Online Statistics
list.description: Access live game statistics online for immediate analysis and strategic insights.

list.title: Durable Construction
list.description: The robust plastic casing ensures the blaster withstands years of intense gameplay.

list.title: LASERTAG OPERATOR Scenario Editing Software:
list.description: The robust plastic casing ensures the blaster withstands years of intense gameplay.

list.title: Free TV OUT app
list.description: TV-OUT is an application for displaying detailed game statistics on large screens for spectators and fans.

list.title: Quick Arena Launch with Tested Scenarios:
list.description: Benefit from our proven scenarios to swiftly launch your arena. Popular games like TEAM BATTLE, DEATHMATCH, BATTLE ROYALE, BOMB DEFUSION, KIDS GAME, CAPTURE THE FLAG, etc offer engaging experiences for players.

list.title: Enhance Game Variety with Additional Scenario Devices:
list.description: Explore a multitude of gaming possibilities with our additional scenario devices. The NEBULA grenade, SMART DOMINATION BOX, SIRIUS, among other devices, add an extra layer of excitement and variety to the gameplay, ensuring a dynamic and thrilling laser tag experience for your customers.

list.title: Manage your laser tag business with ease using the free Lasertag Operator and TV OUT apps!
list.descriptionTop: is an application for managing a laser tag arena directly from your mobile phone or tablet. Statistics on the number of games, operating time of additional devices, setting up game modes and much more.
list.descriptionBottom: is an application for displaying detailed game statistics on large screens for spectators and fans.

title.title: Lasertag’s profitability
title.titleSpan: Calculating ROI for Your Laser Tag Business

lasertagProfitabilitySection.text: At LASERTAG.NET, we help you maximize your Return on Investment (ROI). Our team conducts a thorough analysis of your business, including:
lasertagProfitabilitySection.subtitle: Example

list.title: Number of working days per month: 26
Number of operating hours per day: 9

lasertagProfitabilitySection.roiText: ROI at 30% load - 8 months ROI at 40% load - 4 months ROI at 50% load - 3 months

testDriveSection.title: Test Drive Option
testDriveSection.subtitle: Main advantages of a test drive:

list.title: Try different game scenarios
list.description: Dive into different game scenarios during the test drive. Explore the versatility of our equipment by trying out various game modes and scenarios, getting a taste of the dynamic experiences it can offer.

list.title: Venue Adaptability
list.description: Test the adaptability of our equipment to various venues, whether you are considering an indoor arena, an outdoor space, or a mobile setup. See how our equipment seamlessly integrates into different environments.

list.title: Hands-On Experience
list.description: Engage in a hands-on experience with our state-of-the-art laser tag equipment. Feel the quality, explore the features, and witness the innovation in action.

list.title: Consultation During Test Drive
list.description: Benefit from a consultation with our experts during the test drive. Our managers will guide you through the equipment features, answer your questions, and provide insights into how it can align with your business goals.
list.descriptionSpan: Put our support to the test in real-world scenarios – schedule your test drive today!

list.title: Flexible Trial Period
list.description: We offer a flexible trial period to ensure you have ample time to thoroughly evaluate the equipment's performance. This allows you to make an informed decision based on your specific needs and preferences.

list.title: Reimbursed deposit
list.description: The TEST DRIVE option comes with no obligation. It's a risk-free opportunity for you to assess whether LASERTAG.NET's equipment aligns with your vision for a successful laser tag venture.

partnershipSection.title: Partnership with LASERTAG.NET
partnershipSection.subtitle: At Lasertag.net, we specialize in the
partnershipSection.subtitleSpan: development and full production cycle of laser tag equipment.
partnershipSection.description: Discover the benefits of joining forces with us as a potential dealer. We value strong partnerships and offer exclusive perks to our dealers, including competitive pricing, marketing support, and ongoing collaboration.
partnershipSection.text: Fill out the form below to express your interest, and let's explore the possibilities together!
